subject: Golf
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The 92-year-old Bill Powell, who built the Clearview Golf Club in Ohio, will receive the P.G.A. Distinguished Service Award this week. It is the organization’s highest honor.
snippet: The 92-year-old Bill Powell, who built the Clearview Golf Club in Ohio, will receive the P.G.A. Distinguished Service Award this week. It is the organization’s highest honor.
